text: Conservatives took the most seats, but did not gain an overall majority Elections to the Perth and Kinross District Council took place in May 1988, alongside elections to the councils of Scotland's various other districts. The number of seats and the total vote share won by each party is listed below. Voter turnout was 51.8%. ==References== Category: Perth and Kinross Council elections Category:1988 Scottish local elections
title: 1988 Perth and Kinross District Council election
